name: City Kitty
description:
City Kitty is a small project by Team RainBow Gateux (Team RBG): a couple of hobby game developers.

Use the space bar to make the kitty jump! Remember, it can be held down to jump higher.

Collect tins of cat food, avoid barbed wire and see how far you can go!

The music is from the Ultimate Game Music Collection.

Thanks for playing!
